mapper.select: SELECT ROD.ORDER_ID AS ORDER_ID, RII.RWMATR_ORDER_DETA_ID AS RWMATR_ORDER_DETA_ID, RII.RWMATR_ID AS RWMATR_ID, R.NM AS NM, RI.QY AS QY, RII.DT AS DT, RI.INFER_ID AS INFER_ID, IC.DETA AS DETA FROM RWMATR_IST_INSP RII JOIN RWMATR R ON RII.RWMATR_ID = R.RWMATR_ID JOIN RWMATR_INFER RI ON RI.RWMATR_ORDER_DETA_ID = RII.RWMATR_ORDER_DETA_ID JOIN INFER_CODE IC ON RI.INFER_ID = IC.INFER_ID JOIN RWMATR_ORDER_DETA ROD ON ROD.RWMATR_ORDER_DETA_ID = RII.RWMATR_ORDER_DETA_ID ORDER BY DT DESC
